text:
CULTURE

Kasthuri Sreenivasan Trust: Coimbatore Artistes Meet, Art Gallery, Avanashi Road, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Sri Krishna College of Technology: Orientation Workshop on Decentralised Faecal Sludge Management, ESB Seminar Hall, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Krishna College of Technology: National Conference on Recent Advancement and Efffectual Researches in Electrical Engineering, 10 a.m.

Mnemonics Learning Centre: Workshop on learning strategies for students Dyslexic students, 10 a.m.

Tamil Nadu College of Engineering: 32{+n}{+d}Annual and Sports Day, TCE Auditorium, 2 p.m.

VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Guest lecture on Entrepreneurial Excellence in Today’s Culture, 10 a.m.

Dr. NGP College of Technology: International conference on Recent Advancements in Design, Automation and Intelligent systems and National level workshop on Medical Imaging and Information, 10 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: One-day faculty development program on Embedded Systems, Lecture Hall, 9 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: International Conference on Mechanical and Building Sciences, RNG Memorial Hall, 10 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Department of Management Studies – Workshop on Business Decision Making Using SPSS, 10.30 a.m.

Teja Shakthi Institute of Technology for Women: Annual day and sports day celebrations, 10.30 a.m.

Karpagam Medical College Hospital: CME programme, 9 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
